title: My apartment in Veysonnaz
description: Very nice apartment to rent for four or five people. It includes two bedrooms with two beds each, a bedroom with two bunk beds, a living/dining room and two bathrooms. The apartment is well located with a southwest orientation, a beautiful view of the village of Nendaz in the valley opposite and optimal sunshine. There are two large balconies where you can relax quietly and enjoy the fresh mountain air. Private covered parking is also available.
